frame.name: Dead_or_alive
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Protagonist</fen> is in the dynamic, maintained state of being alive or has exited this state.
<ex><fex name="Protagonist">Frank's</fex> <t>dead</t> <fex name="Figure">body</fex> was apalling.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Explanation</fen> identifies any object or event that brings about the death of the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
<ex>Within hours, Frank was <t>dead</t> <fex name="Explanation">of exposure</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which a <fen>Protagonist</fen> is dead or alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Protagonist</fen> identifies the being or entity that is dead or alive. <ex><fex name="Prot">Frank</fex> was <t>dead</t>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Figure
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target.
<ex>Frank's <t>dead</t> <fex name="Figure">body</fex> was apalling.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is dead or alive.</def-root>
